transcript:
Customer: Thoda pyar maiya tera kya ghat jayega.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aditi sir IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ji mam boliye.
Executive: Kaise hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai mam.
Executive: Thik hai. Achha aapke father ne na kal call kiya tha hume, thik hai regarding kuch ek lead shayad unhone uthai thi to buyer ka detail mang rahe the, thik hai. To humne unko explain kiya ki jab aap lead uthate hai na to wahi pe buyer ki detail hoti hai. To unhone fir check kiya lead buyer ki detail thi, buyer ka number bhi tha.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Thik hai wo ye bhi keh rahe the ki buyer se contact ho nahi pa raha hai to humne ye bhi bola tha ki sir whatsapp kijiye to unhone bola tha whatsapp to kiya hai, thik hai. To abhi ho sakta hai ki kuch revert aaya ho ya jo bhi hai. To unhone kyuki customer care wale number pe call kar diya tha, thik hai sir to isliye ticket khul gaya tha.
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Ticket khul gaya.
Customer: Achha thik hai na hum unko bata diya karenge wo dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: To hum hum fir isko band kar de fir ticket ko.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ha ha thik hai.
Customer: Ha ha ji.
Executive: Band kar de. Aur thoda sa kuch na thoda service ko lekar ke bhi jara baat chit karna tha aapse to.
Customer: To kya boliye.
Executive: Okay to buylead wagera basically aap hi dekh rahe hai ya pitaji dekha?
Customer: Ha abhi to hum hi dekh rahe hai wo bhi dekhte hai hum bhi dekhte hai dono jan ka mobile me app khula hua hai jo lead dekhna hai dekh lete hai.
Executive: Achha achha to koi lead wagera kuch baat chit ho raha hai kisi tarike ka dikkat pareshani.
Customer: Thoda bahut hai mam aise to kuch khas to abhi kuch lead generation to nahi ho raha hai lekin wo hum log consume kar rahe hai ab dekhiye dhire dhire to hona hi chahiye.
Executive: Local ka preference jyada dekhte hai na sir ya kaise karte hai?
Customer: Local ka preference isliye dekhte hai ki local me quantity usi hisab se IndiaMART me upload hota hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ki jisko kam quantity chahiye wo to local me hum usko provide kara hi denge.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Ab bulk wala jo rahega wo aksar jaise kal hi jo papa bol rahe the wo Ranchi ka koi tha wo 100 ton ka requirement dala tha.
Executive: Ranchi ka.
Customer: Achha lekin usse sampark hi nahi ho paya.
Customer: Matlab phone karne se phone nahi uthaya message ka koi reply nahi hai mail bhi kiya to mail ka bhi koi reply nahi hai wo baat hai.
Executive: Achha to aap aapne message kiya tha usko?
Customer: Ha ha message wagera sab wahi whatsapp se kiya tha.
Executive: To number tha na uska matlab number.
Customer: Ha ha number to sahi number to sahi hai.
Executive: Achha achha to dekhiye kyuki abhi aaj ki date me bhi hum jo dekh rahe hai na sir jaise Jharkhand ka Jharkhand aur Bihar.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To requirement aayi hai.
Executive: TMT bar ka hai, thik hai Ranchi ka ek aur jo hai rangta steel ka requirement hai. Aapke area me.
Customer: Achha thik hai na hum usko check kar lete hai aur kuch humko usme kuch usme ye bhi karna hai kuch usme kuch item ko hatana hai kuch add bhi karna hai.
Executive: Bataye na sir kya hatana hai kya.
Customer: Hum usko karte hai hum aapse thoda der me aapse hum khud call kar le rahe hai aapko thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai to ye ticket me band kar du fir dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Ha usko close kar lijiye aap ha.
Executive: Sir ek feedback form jayega aapse request hai ki usko jara jo hai.
Customer: Mail pe aayega?
Executive: Mail pe aapke number pe jayega shayad SMS pe.
Customer: Thik hai dekh lenge.
Executive: Band karenge thik hai. Aur dusra cheez ki hum ek bar TVRO laga rahe hai yani ki reminder set kar rahe hai to sham ka kar le kya 4-5 baje.
Customer: Ha ha ekdam ekdam ekdam.
Executive: To fir isko jara detail me discuss karte hai usko.
Customer: Aap khali ye humko bhej dijiye ek bar ki mera jo jo item kiya hua hai na matlab jo jo upload kiya gaya hai usme kya hai humko wo de dijiye khali.
Executive: Achha wo detail de de.
Customer: Ha wo detail de de ek kam karte hai hum na whatsapp yahi number aapka whatsapp hai na.
Executive: Ha mera to yahi number hai ha isme bhej dijiye.
Executive: Ek bar hum verbally bhi bata dete hai sir agar aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi bhej dijiye na mam fir hum bhi khud dekh ke hi samajh payenge na. Baat wo hai kyuki kabhi kabhi kya hota hai ki photo kuch lag gaya item ka naam kuch likha gaya. Waisa bhi hota hai na bahut jagah to usse dekh ke itne se jyada samajh me aayega.
Executive: Achha achha.
Executive: Nahi koi problem nahi hum aapko bhej denge.
Customer: Nahi to hum my products me ja ke dekh bhi le rahe hai usme to dikha bhi dega mere ko.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo to hum de denge aapko de denge aur ek bar 4-5 baje baat karte hai isko thik karte hai.
Customer: Thik thik thik thik hai thank you.
Customer: Ha ha ji.
Executive:
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's father requested buyer details for a lead.

- Unable to contact a buyer from Ranchi.

- Wants to remove/add items to their IndiaMART listing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained buyer details are in the lead.

- Agreed to send item details via WhatsApp.

- Scheduled a call for 4-5 PM to discuss further.

- Ticket will be closed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send item details via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, listing, follow up, support
